title: Justin Bieber and Hailey Bieber are 'forgoing an immediate honeymoon' after second wedding
text:
They've just tied the knot - for the second time.

But even so, Justin Bieber and wife Hailey are 'forgoing an immediate honeymoon' according to People's sources on Tuesday.

The reveal about the couple's post-wedding plans comes as Justin was again spotted leaving an LA medical appointment with an IV drip in his arm.

Non-traditional: Justin Bieber and wife Hailey are 'forgoing an immediate honeymoon' according to People 's sources on Tuesday

According to the gossip site's sources, 'For Justin and Hailey, every day is like a honeymoon'.

'They are both fine with [not having anything planned].'

Bieber is instead, 'very focused on his music' after having just released the song 10,000 Hours with Dan + Shay.

Justin and Hailey walked down the aisle a second time at the Montage Palmetto Bluff resort in South Carolina on September 30.

Drip drip: The reveal about the couple's post-wedding plans comes as Justin was again spotted leaving an LA medical appointment with an IV drip in his arm

White on: Hailey wore a wedding dress designed by Virgil Abloh for the ceremony, though she had changed out of that by the time it was the garter toss

The couple originally said 'I do' in secret at a courthouse in New York last year, but last month they included friends and family in their celebrations.

Hailey wore a wedding dress designed by Virgil Abloh for the ceremony, though she had changed out of that by the time it was the garter toss.

The couple became engaged following a whirlwind, rekindled romance during a trip to the Bahamas last year.
description: Justin Bieber and wife Hailey are 'forgoing an immediate honeymoon' according to People 's sources on Tuesday.
